name: To Win
description:
A Contest and Game for adults with too much Free Time

By chance Loukas and Hide won a partially paid trip to the island of Lacuna to celebrate Loukas' birthday. Due to Hide inability to keep his mouth shut Loukas gets drag into the world's most pettiest contest of the summer.

The winner wins...

Something that really does not matter

Can you help determine the winner of this summer contest?

Try get all

-4 Endings

-24 unlock able CGs

The Following game contains strong and suggestive language.

______________

This is collab between my fellow Creative Alex writer of Lacuna. Fuchsia and Trenton belong to them and you read more about their story in link below.
https://tapas.io/series/Lacuna-A-Nexus-Troupe-Novel/info

Hide and Loukas belong to me and you can read more about them in the following link
https://tapas.io/series/Demons-Nook/info

Note: It is not necessary to read either novel prior to playing and this visual novel will not spoil either work
